title: TikTok FYP Scraper (Python)
description: Scrapes up to N unique videos from your TikTok FYP using Playwright and a saved login session.

maxVideos.title: Max videos
maxVideos.description: Maximum number of unique videos to collect.

delayMs.title: Delay between videos (ms)
delayMs.description: Wait time between scrolling to the next video.

storageStateKey.title: Storage state key
storageStateKey.description: Key in Apify Key-Value Store containing Playwright storageState JSON.
